FW Work Hours Cc Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Tuesday October AM To Presas Jessica Subject FW Work Hours Please circulate to west gas Orig group Thanks BT Original Message From Grigsby Mike Sent Monday October PM To Allen Phillip K Gay Randall L Heu Mog Holst Keith Huang Jason Kuykendall Tori Lenhart Matthew Lisk Daniel Reitmeyer Jay Sanchez Monique Scott Susan M Smith Matt South Steven P Sullivan Patti Tholt Jane M Tycholiz Barry Wolfe Jason Subject Work Hours Dear West We talked briefly on Monday about our commitment to a full work day at Enron If you are in the office then please be prepared to contribute to the group for a full day Our schedule now calls for critical communication in the afternoons We need to know that each employee will be here every day to create the consistency needed to outperform the rest of the market We want to remain as flexible as possible with all traders when it comes to an emergency but remember that you have a commitment to Enron to contribute a full work day Please organize your vacation on the west desk calendar with Ina and coordinate any early afternoon departures with Ina and myself Also prepare to have your markets covered when you leave the office early Sincerely Mike

FW Vacaction schedules Cc Please let me know what days you plan on taking off Thanks Jessica Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Wednesday October PM To Presas Jessica Subject Vacaction schedules Pls coordinate a vacation schedule planner for me for all of the staff from now until the end of the year including Jan Pls include Denver BT
Video Conference Cc There will be a video conference meeting today from to central time If you have any questions let me know Thanks Jessica
Cc Tycholiz would like to invite you to an Astros game on Thursday July pm Please let me know if you can attend Thanks Jessica Presas

Astros gameNonPrivilegedpst This is just a reminder This Thursday July you were invited to attend an Astros game with Barry Tycholiz Please be ready to leave at around pm If you have any questions let me know Thanks Jessica Presas
Cc Tycholiz would like to invite you to an Astros game on Thursday July pm Please let me know if you can attend Thanks Jessica Presas

FW Move Informationpst Original Message From Collins Angie Sent Thursday January PM To Collins Angie Holcombe Tina Snow Dina Leigh Lorie Quezada Daniel Presas Jessica Gonzales Kathryn Solis Melissa Greif Donna Cc Miller Don Asset Mktg McMichael Jr Ed Zisman Stuart Hoff Jonathan Meyer Chris Knippa Mark Grannen Maria E Plauche Stephen Sewell Doug Bartlett Jeff Subject Move Information All The following groups are scheduled to move on the following dates The moves will take place during the day of your move beginning at am You may not be moved exactly at am however the moves will begin at am GROUP MOVE DATE Power January th need to be packed before leaving TODAY Asset Marketing January th need to be packed before leaving TODAY QFStructured Deals January th need to be packed by end of work day January th DevelopmentTech Services January th need to be packed by end of work day January th Gas Group January th need to be packed by end of work day January th each move will occur during the day beginning at AM on your scheduled date preprinted labels will be delivered the day before the move Dolores Sustaita x each desktop computer will be relocated with the employee label all boxes and equipment CPU and peripherals do not label phones and plasma screens as they will not be moved additional boxes will be delivered to th floor Janelle Duree x telephony issues should be addressed to Tony Alvarado x boxes are located on the rdth floors ALL supplies will be located at ECS please label all boxes with supplies to be moved to this location Please forward this message the your group Let me know if you have any question Thank you Angie

FW Work Hours Cc Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Tuesday October AM To Presas Jessica Subject FW Work Hours Please circulate to west gas Orig group Thanks BT Original Message From Grigsby Mike Sent Monday October PM To Allen Phillip K Gay Randall L Heu Mog Holst Keith Huang Jason Kuykendall Tori Lenhart Matthew Lisk Daniel Reitmeyer Jay Sanchez Monique Scott Susan M Smith Matt South Steven P Sullivan Patti Tholt Jane M Tycholiz Barry Wolfe Jason Subject Work Hours Dear West We talked briefly on Monday about our commitment to a full work day at Enron If you are in the office then please be prepared to contribute to the group for a full day Our schedule now calls for critical communication in the afternoons We need to know that each employee will be here every day to create the consistency needed to outperform the rest of the market We want to remain as flexible as possible with all traders when it comes to an emergency but remember that you have a commitment to Enron to contribute a full work day Please organize your vacation on the west desk calendar with Ina and coordinate any early afternoon departures with Ina and myself Also prepare to have your markets covered when you leave the office early Sincerely Mike

FW Vacaction schedules Cc Please let me know what days you plan on taking off Thanks Jessica Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Wednesday October PM To Presas Jessica Subject Vacaction schedules Pls coordinate a vacation schedule planner for me for all of the staff from now until the end of the year including Jan Pls include Denver BT
Video Conference Cc There will be a video conference meeting today from to central time If you have any questions let me know Thanks Jessica

West Gas Origination Meeting Sept per Barry Tycholiz Cc Further to some recent conversations block off Sunday Sept and all day Monday Sept for a group offsite By invite you will be asked to participate in some offsite activities and business meetings in Denver All flight hotel travel meals and entertainment will be coordinated by Barry Tycholiz Booking of flights which will have you departing on Sunday am and arriving around in Denver have been coordinated by our group to keep control of the flight costs We should have you home early on Monday evening around pm We have been able to get some really low fares and I want to keep them that way All the Houston based staff plus Portland Fuller will come to Denver Please see Jessica regarding flight times and schedules A more formal agenda and list of topicspresenters will be sent to each of you in the next couple of days If there are any questions give me a call at BT

RE Cellular Phone BillsBarry The rate plan all of you are on is for nationwide anytime minutes Name Monthly Average of Minutes Suggestions Barry Tycholiz Lower rate plan to minutes Kim Ward Keep rate plan Stephanie Miller Lower rate plan to minutes RATE PLANS min min min min min min min Any extra charges you see on the bill doesnt mean they are getting charged for roaminglong distance They most likely include calls accessories or exceeding minutes I will get back to you with how much is being spent in Denver Jessica Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Wednesday October PM To Presas Jessica Subject Cellular Phone Bills Jessica it appears that we pay a monthly fee of mth plus monthly optional charges and all long distance and local charges I would like to discuss the details of a bill What is this base fee are there other plans available Are we getting any value in using cingular especially this plan How many minutes are we getting what are the long distance and roaming rates In aggregate my monthly cell phone bill for my group looks to be around mth for people total and this is a little high Also pls verify who has cell phones in Denver and what the monthly bills look like for this office Thanks BT

FW Presentation AnnouncementYou are invited to attend the following presentation PSIM A Power Simulation Tool PSIM is a proprietary model developed by Enron Research Group It takes Power Gas Weather and demand information into consideration and uses MonteCarlo simulation to assess the expected deal value and risk distribution It evaluates complex electricity related contracts such as Full Requirement and load following contract It also provides a valuation tool for power assets and asset management deals It works for both deal specific or portfolio issues In this presentation we will show how the model can be used to deal with various types of contracts explain the model structure and point out further applications Date October Time pm Location EBC Presenter Alex Huang Registration is required for a head count Please call Shirley Crenshaw at to register Pizza and soft drinks will be served
Messages Call Bruce Webster w Hunter Oil Morgan w Bank of America
Call Peter Meier w PGE Please call Dan w PGE He needs the number to the Corral contact
Call John Zuffeleri in Calgary
messagesPlease call Mark Whitt
Call Kim

FW Move InfoOriginal Message From Rangel Ina Sent Friday November AM To Rybarski Amanda Moore Kevin G Hogan Irena D Bates Kimberly Villarreal Alexandra Presas Jessica Young Becky Vuittonet Laura Quezada Daniel Cc Hardy Kimberly Panos Jason Hernandez Jesus A Subject Please forward to your groups There is only week left before moving into the new building There are two shredco containers located at EBE and in the freight elevator for documents that need shredding Also there will be a couple of large trash containers located on the nd floor today and next Friday Please start the cleanup process Remember You can only move boxes per person plus equipment Take home all IPAQS Blackberrys Palm Pilots and Laptops Friday so that nothing is misplaced If you have a cellular phone charger on your deskdont forget to pack Clean out all Voicemails by PM on Friday The new Enron Building will be closed to all until AM on Monday Morning If you try to come up here you will not be allowed in the building Please give your User ID and Password to your assistant so shehe can make sure that everything is up and running for you on Monday morning If you have a headset please pack it They will not be installed until Monday morning Since there are no amtels moving please be sure you have MSN messenger installed in your computer because this is what your assistant will use to give you your messages If you do not have it your assistant can help you install it Please label your PC Boxes on the ends and cradles scanners etc You will have a new mouse and keyboard in the new building and your monitors will have speakers on them so you dont have If you have any other questions or concerns please let me know Many thanks Ina Rangel Administrative Coordinator Enron North America Voice Fax

RE blackberryWe are supposed to be in the new building next week Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Monday November PM To Presas Jessica Subject RE blackberry Lets not get it installed until we move Thanks BT Original Message From Presas Jessica Sent Monday November PM To Tycholiz Barry Subject blackberry The blackberry costs hardware recurring monthly Blackberry service fee activation fee warranty fee They should install it sometime next week
Please call Eric Le Daine ASAP

REyes Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston Sent Thursday October AM To Presas Jessica Subject RE Thanks from Original Message From Presas Jessica Sent Thursday October AM To Ward Kim S Houston Subject Kim You can use John Arnolds office this afternoon

FW K Ward Oct Etkt reprocessedOriginal Message From Catherine Elder mailto Sent Monday October AM To JESSICA NORNCOM Subject K Ward Oct Etkt reprocessed AGENT DFCE BOOKING REF YSINZ WARDKIM ECNA ETKT RECEIPT ENRON CORP DATE OCT SERVICE DATE FROM TO DEPART ARRIVE CONTINENTAL AIRLINES OCT HOUSTON TX PHOENIX AZ P P CO K MON GBUSH INTERCO SKY HARBOR INT TERMINAL C TERMINAL SNACK NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION AIRCRAFT BOEING SEAT D NO SMOKING CONFIRMED WARDKIMIDSC AISLE SEAT ASSIGNED THIS SEGMENT CONTINENTAL AIRLINES OCT PHOENIX AZ HOUSTON TX P P CO K TUE SKY HARBOR INT GBUSH INTERCO TERMINAL TERMINAL C SNACK NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION AIRCRAFT BOEING SEAT D NO SMOKING CONFIRMED WARDKIMIDSC MISCELLANEOUS FEB HOUSTON TX THU THANK YOU FOR USING THE TAP RESERVATION NUMBERS COUBPH WARDKIM SCR CO FREQUENT FLYER COFN ASSISTANT JESSICA PRESAS INTL TVLRS CARRY SOS WALLET CARD WENRON ASSISTANCE INFO CALL SOS MEDICAL EMERGENCYIN US ALL SOS MEDICAL EMERGENCYINTL COLLECT NEW FAA REQUIREMENTS CHECK IN AT LEAST HOURS PRIOR TO FLIGHT DEPARTURE FOR DOMESTIC HOURS FOR INTERNATIONAL TO GO THROUGH SECURITY YOU ARE REQUIRED TO HAVE AN ITINERARY GENERATED BY AN AIRLINE OR TRAVEL AGENCY CONFIRMING AN ELECTRONIC TICKET INCLUDING TICKET NUMBER OR A RECEIPT FOR AN ELECTRONIC TICKET INCLUDING TICKET NUMBER ANDOR A BOARDING PASS FOR THE CURRENT DAY THIS IS THE PASSENGER RECEIPT FOR YOUR ELECTRONIC TICKET PLEASE CHECKIN WITH PHOTO IDENTIFICATION AND WITH EITHER THIS RECEIPT OR YOUR CONFIRMATION NUMBER YOUR ETKT CONFIRMATION NUMBER IS UBPH ALL FARES ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE UNTIL TICKETEDPURCHASED Catherine Elder The Travel Ageny in the Park Lamar Suite Houston TX
Jim w Las Cruces calledhe will call you back on Wednesday
Video Conference Cc There will be a video conference meeting today from to central time If you have any questions let me know Thanks Jessica

FW Presentation AnnouncementYou are invited to attend the following presentation PSIM A Power Simulation Tool PSIM is a proprietary model developed by Enron Research Group It takes Power Gas Weather and demand information into consideration and uses MonteCarlo simulation to assess the expected deal value and risk distribution It evaluates complex electricity related contracts such as Full Requirement and load following contract It also provides a valuation tool for power assets and asset management deals It works for both deal specific or portfolio issues In this presentation we will show how the model can be used to deal with various types of contracts explain the model structure and point out further applications Date October Time pm Location EBC Presenter Alex Huang Registration is required for a head count Please call Shirley Crenshaw at to register Pizza and soft drinks will be served
